Container.Name: SimpleGuardHome
Container.Overview:
A modern web application for checking and adding domains to custom filtering rules in AdGuard Home. Built with FastAPI and modern JavaScript, following the official AdGuard Home OpenAPI specification. Meant as a simple AdGuard Home web interface for users to check if a domain is blocked, and then add it.
GitHub Repo: https://github.com/pacnpal/simpleguardhome

Config.Name: Adguard Home URL
Config.Description: The full URL of your hosted Adguard Home instance.

Config.Name: Adguard Home Port
Config.Description: The port used to connect to your Adguard Home instance.

Config.Name: Adguard Home Username
Config.Description: The username for the Adguard Home user.

Config.Name: Adguard Home Password
Config.Description: The password for the Adguard Home user.

Config.Name: SimpleGuardHome WebUI Port
Config.Description: Port that SimpleGuardHome will be accessed at.

Config.Name: Rules Backup Path
Config.Description: The path where SimpleGuardHome will backup rules.
